trans-unit.source: Represents the data in a SOAP request or SOAP response at a specific <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta i dati in una richiesta o risposta SOAP in un oggetto specifico <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The primary use of the SoapMessage class is for SOAP extensions, representing the data in a SOAP request or SOAP response.
trans-unit.target: L'utilizzo principale della classe SoapMessage è per le estensioni SOAP, che rappresenta i dati in una richiesta o risposta SOAP.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapExtension.ProcessMessage%2A> method is called, a <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapExtension> receives a SoapMessage at each <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage>.
trans-unit.target: Quando il <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapExtension.ProcessMessage%2A>metodo viene chiamato un <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapExtension>riceve SoapMessage in ogni <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage>.</xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage> </xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapExtension> </xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapExtension.ProcessMessage%2A>

trans-unit.source: It is up to the particular SOAP extension to choose how to process the SoapMessage.
trans-unit.target: È responsabilità dell'estensione SOAP di scegliere la modalità di elaborazione di SoapMessage.

trans-unit.source: Common SOAP extensions include encryption and compression.
trans-unit.target: Le estensioni SOAP comuni includono la crittografia e compressione.

trans-unit.source: SOAP extensions can be applied to either or both an XML Web service method created using ASP.NET or an XML Web service client.
trans-unit.target: Le estensioni SOAP possono essere applicate a uno o entrambi un metodo di servizio Web XML creati usando ASP.NET o un client del servizio Web XML.

trans-unit.source: When a SOAP extension is applied to an XML Web service method, the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapExtension.ProcessMessage%2A> method receives an instance of <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapServerMessage>, which derives from SoapMessage.
trans-unit.target: Quando un'estensione SOAP viene applicata a un metodo di servizio Web XML, il <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapExtension.ProcessMessage%2A>metodo riceve un'istanza di <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapServerMessage>, che deriva da SoapMessage.</xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapServerMessage> </xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapExtension.ProcessMessage%2A>

trans-unit.source: Likewise, when a SOAP extension is applied to an XML Web service client, <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapExtension.ProcessMessage%2A> receives an instance of <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapClientMessage>.
trans-unit.target: Analogamente, quando un'estensione SOAP viene applicata a un client del servizio Web XML, <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapExtension.ProcessMessage%2A>riceve un'istanza di <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapClientMessage>.</xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapClientMessage> </xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapExtension.ProcessMessage%2A>

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets the SOAPAction HTTP request header field for the SOAP request or SOAP response.
trans-unit.target: Quando sottoposto a override in una classe derivata, ottiene il campo di intestazione di richiesta HTTP SOAPAction per la richiesta o risposta SOAP.

trans-unit.source: The Action property can be accessed during any <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage>.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà azione accessibili durante qualsiasi <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage>.</xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage>

trans-unit.source: The SOAPAction HTTP request header field for the SOAP request or SOAP response.
trans-unit.target: Il campo di intestazione HTTP SOAPAction richiesta per la richiesta o risposta SOAP.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the contents of the <xref uid="langword_csharp_Content-Encoding" name="Content-Encoding" href=""></xref> HTTP header.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta il contenuto del <xref uid="langword_csharp_Content-Encoding" name="Content-Encoding" href=""> </xref> intestazione HTTP.

trans-unit.source: A SOAP extension can set the ContentEncoding property to provide supplementary information about the encoding of a SOAP message without changing the media type as expressed in the `Content-Type` HTTP header.
trans-unit.target: Un'estensione SOAP è possibile impostare la proprietà di ContentEncoding per fornire informazioni supplementari sulla codifica di un messaggio SOAP senza modificare il tipo di supporto come espresso il `Content-Type` intestazione HTTP.

trans-unit.source: The contents of the <xref uid="langword_csharp_Content-Encoding" name="Content-Encoding" href=""></xref> HTTP header.
trans-unit.target: Il contenuto del <xref uid="langword_csharp_Content-Encoding" name="Content-Encoding" href=""> </xref> intestazione HTTP.

trans-unit.source: The current <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage"></xref> is <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage"></xref> or <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage"></xref> stages.
trans-unit.target: The current <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage"></xref> is <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage"></xref> or <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage"></xref> stages.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the HTTP <xref uid="langword_csharp_Content-Type" name="Content-Type" href=""></xref> of the SOAP request or SOAP response.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta il protocollo HTTP <xref uid="langword_csharp_Content-Type" name="Content-Type" href=""> </xref> della richiesta SOAP o della risposta SOAP.

trans-unit.source: The ContentType property can only be accessed in the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage> and <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage> stages; otherwise, an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà ContentType è accessibile solo nel <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage>e <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage>fasi; in caso contrario, un <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>viene generata un'eccezione.</xref:System.InvalidOperationException> </xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage> </xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessage.ContentEncoding%2A> property, instead of the ContentType property to provide supplementary information about the encoding of a SOAP message.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare il <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessage.ContentEncoding%2A>proprietà, anziché la proprietà ContentType per fornire informazioni supplementari sulla codifica di un messaggio SOAP.</xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessage.ContentEncoding%2A>

trans-unit.source: The HTTP <xref uid="langword_csharp_Content-Type" name="Content-Type" href=""></xref> of the SOAP request or SOAP response.
trans-unit.target: Il protocollo HTTP <xref uid="langword_csharp_Content-Type" name="Content-Type" href=""> </xref> della richiesta SOAP o della risposta SOAP.

trans-unit.source: The default is "text/xml".
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è "text/xml".

trans-unit.source: ContentType is accessed <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage"></xref> or <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage"></xref> stages.
trans-unit.target: È possibile accedere a ContentType <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage"> </xref> o <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage"> </xref> fasi.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, asserts that the current <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage"></xref> is a stage where in parameters are available.
trans-unit.target: Quando sottoposto a override in una classe derivata, asserisce che corrente <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage"> </xref> è una fase in cui i parametri in sono disponibili.

trans-unit.source: The asserted stage is different for XML Web service clients and XML Web service methods.
trans-unit.target: La fase di asserzione è diversa per i client del servizio Web XML e i metodi del servizio Web XML.

trans-unit.source: An XML Web service method's in parameters are available after the SOAP request is deserialized in the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage> stage.
trans-unit.target: Nei parametri di un metodo di servizio Web XML è disponibile dopo la richiesta SOAP viene deserializzata nel <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage>stage.</xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage>

trans-unit.source: For an XML Web service client, the in parameters are available prior to the SOAP request serialization process in the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage> stage.
trans-unit.target: Per un client del servizio Web XML, i parametri in sono disponibili prima del processo di serializzazione della richiesta SOAP nel <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage>stage.</xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage>

trans-unit.source: EnsureInStage can be called during any <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage>, however an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> is thrown when in parameters are not available.
trans-unit.target: Può essere richiamato durante qualsiasi EnsureInStage <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage>, tuttavia un <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>viene generata quando parametri non sono disponibili.</xref:System.InvalidOperationException> </xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage>

trans-unit.source: In parameters are not available.
trans-unit.target: Nei parametri non sono disponibili.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, asserts that the current <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage"></xref> stage is a stage where out parameters are available.
trans-unit.target: Quando sottoposto a override in una classe derivata, asserisce che l'oggetto corrente <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage"> </xref> corrisponde a una fase in cui i parametri out sono disponibili.

trans-unit.source: The asserted stage is different for XML Web service clients and XML Web service methods.
trans-unit.target: La fase di asserzione è diversa per i client del servizio Web XML e i metodi del servizio Web XML.

trans-unit.source: An XML Web service method's out parameters are available prior to the SOAP response serialization process in the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage> stage.
trans-unit.target: È disponibile prima del processo di serializzazione della risposta SOAP in parametri out di un metodo di servizio Web XML di <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage>stage.</xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage>

trans-unit.source: In an XML Web service client, the out parameters are available after the SOAP response deserialization process in the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage> stage.
trans-unit.target: In un client del servizio Web XML, i parametri out sono disponibili dopo il processo di deserializzazione della risposta SOAP nel <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage>stage.</xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage>

trans-unit.source: EnsureOutStage can be called during any <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage>, however an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> is thrown when out parameters are not available.
trans-unit.target: Può essere richiamato durante qualsiasi EnsureOutStage <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage>, tuttavia un <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>viene generata quando parametri non sono disponibili.</xref:System.InvalidOperationException> </xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage>

trans-unit.source: Out parameters are not available.
trans-unit.target: I parametri out non sono disponibili.

trans-unit.source: Ensures that the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage"></xref> of the call to the XML Web service method is the stage or stages passed in.
trans-unit.target: Assicura che il <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage"> </xref> della chiamata al Web XML metodo del servizio è la fase o alle fasi passate.

trans-unit.source: If the current processing stage is not one of the stages passed in, an exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: Se la fase di elaborazione corrente non è una delle fasi passate, viene generata un'eccezione.

trans-unit.source: Multiple stages can be asserted by performing a bitwise OR operation on multiple instances of the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage> class.
trans-unit.target: Possano asserire più fasi eseguendo un'operazione OR bit per bit su più istanze della <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage>classe.</xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage>

trans-unit.source: EnsureStage can be called during any <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage>.
trans-unit.target: EnsureStage può essere chiamato durante qualsiasi <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage>.</xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage"></xref> asserted.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage"> </xref> dichiarato.

trans-unit.source: The current <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage"></xref> is not the asserted stage or stages.
trans-unit.target: Corrente <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage"> </xref> non è la fase o asserite fasi.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException"></xref> from the call to the XML Web service method.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException"> </xref> dalla chiamata al metodo del servizio Web XML.

trans-unit.source: The Exception property can be accessed during any <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage>.
trans-unit.target: È possibile accedere alla proprietà Exception durante qualsiasi <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage>.</xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException"></xref> that occurred in the call to the XML Web service method.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException"> </xref> che si è verificato nella chiamata al metodo del servizio Web XML.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if no <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException"></xref> has occurred during the call to the Web Sevice method.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>Se non <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException"> </xref> si è verificato durante la chiamata al metodo del servizio Web.

trans-unit.source: Gets the parameter passed into the XML Web service method at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il parametro passato al metodo del servizio Web XML in corrispondenza dell'indice specificato.

trans-unit.source: The GetInParameterValue property is only accessible when in parameters are available.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà GetInParameterValue è solo quando i parametri in sono disponibili.

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET throws <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> when accessing the GetInParameterValue property if in parameters are not available.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET genera <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>quando l'accesso alla proprietà di GetInParameterValue in caso di parametri non sono disponibili.</xref:System.InvalidOperationException>

trans-unit.source: In a <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapClientMessage> the in parameters are available in the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage><xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapClientMessage>I parametri in sono disponibili in <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage><xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage>.</xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage></xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage> </xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapClientMessage> un

trans-unit.source: In a <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapServerMessage> the in parameters are available in the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage><xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapServerMessage>I parametri in sono disponibili in <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage><xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage>.</xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage></xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage> </xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapServerMessage> un

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the parameter in the array of parameters.
trans-unit.target: Indice in base zero del parametro nella matrice di parametri.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> representing the parameter at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref:System.Object>che rappresenta il parametro in corrispondenza dell'indice specificato.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: The index parameter is less than 0 or greater than the length of the parameters array.
trans-unit.target: Il index parametro è minore di 0 o maggiore della lunghezza della matrice di parametri.

trans-unit.source: Accessing this property when in parameters are not available.
trans-unit.target: Accedere a questa proprietà quando i parametri in non sono disponibili.

trans-unit.source: For details see the Remarks section.
trans-unit.target: Per informazioni dettagliate, vedere la sezione Osservazioni.

trans-unit.source: Gets the out parameter passed into the XML Web service method at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il parametro out passato al metodo del servizio Web XML in corrispondenza dell'indice specificato.

trans-unit.source: If out parameters are not available, ASP.NET throws an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> when accessing the GetOutParameterValue property.
trans-unit.target: Se i parametri non sono disponibili, ASP.NET genera un <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>quando l'accesso alla proprietà GetOutParameterValue.</xref:System.InvalidOperationException>

trans-unit.source: In a <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapClientMessage> the out parameters are available in the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage><xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapClientMessage>I parametri out sono disponibili in <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage><xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage>.</xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage></xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage> </xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapClientMessage> un

trans-unit.source: In a <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapServerMessage> the out parameters are available in the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage> of the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapServerMessage>I parametri out sono disponibili nella <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage> <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage>.</xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage> </xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage> </xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapServerMessage> un

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the parameter in the array of parameters.
trans-unit.target: Indice in base zero del parametro nella matrice di parametri.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> representing the parameter at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref:System.Object>che rappresenta il parametro in corrispondenza dell'indice specificato.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: The index parameter is greater than the length of the parameters array.
trans-unit.target: Il index parametro è maggiore della lunghezza della matrice di parametri.

trans-unit.source: Accessing this property when out parameters are not available.
trans-unit.target: Accedere a questa proprietà quando i parametri out non sono disponibili.

trans-unit.source: For details see the Remarks section.
trans-unit.target: Per informazioni dettagliate, vedere la sezione Osservazioni.

trans-unit.source: Gets the return value of an XML Web service method.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il valore restituito di un metodo di servizio Web XML.

trans-unit.source: If a return value is not available, ASP.NET throws <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> when accessing the GetReturnValue property.
trans-unit.target: Se un valore restituito non è disponibile, ASP.NET genera <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>quando l'accesso alla proprietà GetReturnValue.</xref:System.InvalidOperationException>

trans-unit.source: In a <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapClientMessage> the return value is available when the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage> value is <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage>.
trans-unit.target: In un <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapClientMessage>il valore restituito è disponibile quando il <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage>valore è <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage>.</xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage> </xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage> </xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapClientMessage>

trans-unit.source: In a <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapServerMessage> the return value is available when <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage> value is <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage>.
trans-unit.target: In un <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapServerMessage>il valore restituito è disponibile quando <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage>il valore è <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage>.</xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage> </xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage> </xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapServerMessage>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> representing the return value of the XML Web service method.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref:System.Object>che rappresenta il valore restituito del metodo del servizio Web XML.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: The XML Web service method does not have a return value.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo del servizio Web XML non dispone di un valore restituito.

trans-unit.source: OR The return value is not available.
trans-unit.target: O il valore restituito non è disponibile.

trans-unit.source: For details see the Remarks section
trans-unit.target: Per informazioni dettagliate, vedere la sezione Osservazioni

trans-unit.source: A collection of the SOAP headers applied to the current SOAP request or SOAP response.
trans-unit.target: Raccolta di intestazioni SOAP applicato a una richiesta SOAP corrente o risposta SOAP.

trans-unit.source: SOAP headers are an optional portion of a SOAP request or SOAP response.
trans-unit.target: Intestazioni SOAP rappresentano una parte facoltativa di una richiesta o risposta SOAP.

trans-unit.source: For more details on using SOAP headers in XML Web services created using ASP.NET and their clients, see the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeader> class.
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sull'utilizzo di intestazioni SOAP nei servizi Web XML creati tramite ASP.NET e dei relativi client, vedere la <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeader>classe.</xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeader>

trans-unit.source: Although the Headers property can be accessed at any stage, it is only populated with the SOAP header information in the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage> and <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage> stages.
trans-unit.target: Anche se la proprietà delle intestazioni sono accessibili in qualsiasi fase, viene popolato solo con le informazioni di intestazione SOAP di <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage>e <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage>fasi.</xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage> </xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeaderCollection"></xref> of the SOAP headers applied to the current SOAP request or SOAP response.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeaderCollection"> </xref> delle intestazioni SOAP applicato a una richiesta SOAP corrente o risposta SOAP.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>, if there are no SOAP headers.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>, se non sono disponibili intestazioni SOAP.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets a representation of the method prototype for the XML Web service method for which the SOAP request is intended.
trans-unit.target: Quando sottoposto a override in una classe derivata, ottiene una rappresentazione del prototipo di metodo per il metodo di servizio Web XML a cui è destinata la richiesta SOAP.

trans-unit.source: Although MethodInfo can be accessed during any <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage>, it only has data during <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage> and <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage>.
trans-unit.target: Sebbene sia possibile accedere MethodInfo durante qualsiasi <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage>dispone solo di dati durante il <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage>e <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage>.</xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage> </xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage> </xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.LogicalMethodInfo"></xref> representing the XML Web service method for which the SOAP request is intended.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.LogicalMethodInfo"> </xref> che rappresenta il metodo di servizio Web XML a cui è destinata la richiesta SOAP.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapDocumentMethodAttribute.OneWay%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property of either the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapDocumentMethodAttribute"></xref> or the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapRpcMethodAttribute"></xref> attribute applied to the XML Web service method.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica il <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapDocumentMethodAttribute.OneWay%2A?displayProperty=fullName> proprietà di uno il <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapDocumentMethodAttribute"> </xref> o <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapRpcMethodAttribute"> </xref> attributo applicato al metodo del servizio Web XML.

trans-unit.source: See the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapDocumentMethodAttribute.OneWay%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property of <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapDocumentMethodAttribute> or <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapRpcMethodAttribute> for details about one-way XML Web service methods.
trans-unit.target: Vedere il <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapDocumentMethodAttribute.OneWay%2A?displayProperty=fullName>proprietà <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapDocumentMethodAttribute>o <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapRpcMethodAttribute>per informazioni dettagliate sui metodi di servizio Web XML unidirezionali.</xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapRpcMethodAttribute> </xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapDocumentMethodAttribute> </xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapDocumentMethodAttribute.OneWay%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The OneWay property is accessible in all stages of <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage>.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà OneWay è accessibile in tutte le fasi di <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage>.</xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapDocumentMethodAttribute.OneWay*> property of the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapDocumentMethodAttribute"></xref> or <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapRpcMethodAttribute"></xref> applied to the XML Web service method is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se il <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapDocumentMethodAttribute.OneWay*>proprietà del <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapDocumentMethodAttribute"> </xref> o <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapRpcMethodAttribute"> </xref> applicati al metodo del servizio è Web XML <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapDocumentMethodAttribute.OneWay*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the version of the SOAP protocol used to communicate with the XML Web service.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene la versione del protocollo SOAP utilizzata per comunicare con il servizio Web XML.

trans-unit.source: For a <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapServerMessage>, the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapServerMessage.SoapVersion%2A> property is guaranteed to be valid after the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage> stage.
trans-unit.target: Per un <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapServerMessage>, <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapServerMessage.SoapVersion%2A>proprietà è sicuramente valido dopo il <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage>stage.</xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage> </xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapServerMessage.SoapVersion%2A> </xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapServerMessage>

trans-unit.source: In the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage> stage the property is available, however the SOAP message has not been completely processed and SOAP extensions that may alter the contents of the SOAP message have not run.
trans-unit.target: Nel <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage>fase la proprietà è disponibile, ma il messaggio SOAP non è stato completamente elaborato e le estensioni SOAP che potrebbero alterare il contenuto del messaggio SOAP non sono stati eseguiti.</xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapProtocolVersion"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Uno del <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapProtocolVersion"> </xref> valori.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapProtocolVersion"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapProtocolVersion"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage"></xref> of the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessage"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Gets the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage"></xref> of the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessage"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: The Stage property can be accessed at any <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage>.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà della fase è possibile accedere in qualsiasi <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage>.</xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage"></xref> of the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessage"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: The <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage"></xref> of the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessage"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the data representing the SOAP request or SOAP response in the form of a <xref:System.IO.Stream>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene i dati che rappresenta la richiesta o risposta SOAP sotto forma di un <xref:System.IO.Stream>.</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: SOAP extensions that inspect the data representing a SOAP request or SOAP response, such as a logging SOAP extension, can use the `Stream` property to view the data at each <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage>.
trans-unit.target: Le estensioni SOAP per analizzare i dati che rappresenta una richiesta o risposta SOAP, ad esempio una registrazione di estensione SOAP, è possono utilizzare il `Stream` proprietà per visualizzare i dati in ogni <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage>.</xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage>

trans-unit.source: SOAP extensions that modify the data representing a SOAP request or SOAP response, such as encryption or compression SOAP extensions, should do so with the <xref:System.IO.Stream> passed into the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapExtension.ChainStream%2A> method of <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapExtension>.
trans-unit.target: Le estensioni SOAP che modificano i dati che rappresenta una richiesta o risposta SOAP, ad esempio le estensioni SOAP di crittografia e compressione, devono farlo con <xref:System.IO.Stream>passato al <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapExtension.ChainStream%2A>metodo <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapExtension>.</xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapExtension> </xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapExtension.ChainStream%2A> </xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: The Stream property of <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessage> passed into <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapExtension.ProcessMessage%2A> is read-only.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà del flusso di <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessage>passato <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapExtension.ProcessMessage%2A>è di sola lettura.</xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapExtension.ProcessMessage%2A> </xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessage>

trans-unit.source: For more information on modifying the data representing a SOAP request or SOAP response, see <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapExtension.ChainStream%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sulla modifica dei dati che rappresenta una richiesta o risposta SOAP, vedere <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapExtension.ChainStream%2A>.</xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapExtension.ChainStream%2A>

trans-unit.source: A read-only instance of the <xref:System.IO.Stream> class.
trans-unit.target: Un'istanza di sola lettura di <xref:System.IO.Stream>classe.</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets the base URL of the XML Web service.
trans-unit.target: Quando sottoposto a override in una classe derivata, ottiene l'URL di base del servizio Web XML.

trans-unit.source: The Url property can be accessed during any <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage>.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà Url accessibili durante qualsiasi <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage>.</xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage>

trans-unit.source: The base URL of the XML Web service.
trans-unit.target: L'URL di base del servizio Web XML.
